items.text: back of a length, slanted across, punched to extra cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, no run

items.text: bowled around the legs. Back of a length, keeps a little low, he tries to tuck it around off the pads but the ball skips through and clatters into the stumps
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Bravo, OUT

dismissal.text: DM Bravo  b Rubel Hossain 27 (43b 1x4 1x6) SR: 62.79

items.text: full outside off, defended into the off side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, shuffles across and keeps it out
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: full outside off, leans into a drive to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Samin : "So many jinx takes place here, I'll put a one on: Bangladesh will lose today. (Bravo just got out as I wrote it. Espncricinfo is amazing!!)"
items.text: back of a length, angling in, stays back and defends
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: back of a length, angled into middle, tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of a length on off, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: slower length ball, gets forward and pushes into the off side. He has overstepped
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 no ball

items.text: short, angling in, swivels and pulls over square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, SIX runs

items.text: short of a length around off, punched to extra cover off the backfoot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: tucked to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length on off, defended between midwicket and mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, 1 run
Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short ball, gets under it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: short, angled over his left shoulder as he half-ducks
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, pushed into cover for a quick one
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: short of length on middle, nudged to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of length, nudged with the angle behind square
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, 1 run

items.text: short of length, cuts in, blocked to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: short of a length, angled in, tucked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: full around off, driven to the right of sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full and slow at 115ks outside off, pushed to extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Samuels, no run

items.text: short of a length, opens the face past backward point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run
